mapper.sql: AQI, Area, CO, CO_24h, ID, Latitude, Longitude, NO2, NO2_24h, O3, O3_24h, O3_8h, O3_8h_24h, OrderId, PM10, PM10_24h, PM2_5, PM2_5_24h, PositionName, PrimaryPollutant, Quality, SO2, SO2_24h, StationCode, TimePoint

AVG(AQI), Area, AVG(CO), AVG(CO_24h), ID, Latitude, Longitude, AVG(NO2), AVG(NO2_24h), AVG(O3), AVG(O3_24h), AVG(O3_8h), AVG(O3_8h_24h), OrderId, PM10, AVG(PM10_24h), AVG(PM2_5), AVG(PM2_5_24h), PositionName, PrimaryPollutant, Quality, AVG(SO2), AVG(SO2_24h), StationCode, TimePoint
AVG(SO2) AS SO2, AVG(NO2) AS NO2, AVG(PM2_5) AS PM2_5, AVG(PM10) AS PM10, AVG(CO) AS CO, AVG(O3_8h) AS O3_8h, AVG(AQI) AS AQI, AVG(O3) AS O3
AVG(SO2) AS val_SO2, AVG(NO2) AS val_NO2, AVG(PM2_5) AS val_PM2_5, AVG(PM10) AS val_PM10, AVG(CO) AS val_CO, AVG(O3_8h) AS val_O3_8h, AVG(AQI) AS val_AQI, AVG(O3) AS val_O3
AVG(SO2)>150 as SO2 , AVG(NO2)>80 as NO2 , AVG(PM2_5)>75 as PM2_5 , AVG(PM10)>150 as PM10 , AVG(CO)>4 as CO , MAX(O3_8h)>160 as O3_8h, MAX(O3)>200 as O3
sum(SO2) as SO2, sum(NO2) as NO2, sum(PM2_5) as PM2_5, sum(PM10) as PM10, sum(CO) as CO, sum(O3_8h) as O3_8h, sum(O3) as O3
mapper.select:
select
from PM_25 where TimePoint >= #{startTime} and TimePoint < #{endTime}

SELECT stationCode, AREA,
FROM PM_25 p LEFT JOIN pm_station s ON p.stationCode = s.stationId WHERE YEAR(p.timepoint) = 2014 AND s.longitude BETWEEN #{lonMin} AND #{lonMax} AND s.latitude BETWEEN #{latMin} AND #{latMax} GROUP BY Area

SELECT ( select Area as area
from ${tableName} where and StationCode in
#{station.stationId}
and TimePoint >= #{startTime} and TimePoint < #{endTime} group by area ) t

select timepoint,
from PM_25 where StationCode in
#{station.stationId}
and TimePoint >= #{startTime} and TimePoint < #{endTime} group by ${dateUnit}(timepoint) order by timepoint desc
select DATE_FORMAT(max(TimePoint),"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") from (select MAX(TimePoint) as TimePoint from pm_25_JJJ union all select MAX(TimePoint) as TimePoint from PM_25) temp
